vsParam:
Uh?
Varerian, there seems to be a notice here.
Ah, it's true. Let me see...

"The following members have withdrawn from the Dardala Company:
Varerian"... Ahhhh!? Wh-what is going on?

Varerian... has withdrawn!?
Let's go ask Lord Scalcap!

Hey, father!
What is with that notice!?

Oh, you saw that. It's what it says, haha! Varerian! From now on,
you're not a member of the Dardala Company anymore!

Wh-why!?
I said I want to assist you, father...

I'm glad you see me as your role model.
I also know I'm your top priority when you plan everything.

But...
You've got to live your own life.

Yeah.
Many people around you need your support.

You don't belong here.
Think about what you want to do... and what you should do...

Go figure all that out by traveling with [px]!
Hahahaha!

He... He punched you!?
Are... Are you OK? Varerian...

Hee... Heehee... That's your way of encouraging me...
... Got it. I'll leave here, father... Um.

Are you all right!?
He's not fine by agreeing to "leave"!? Hey!?

That's it.
Everyone, he's not ready to grow up.

But still, he's my favorite son.
Please take him... to see the vast world.

Hahaha! Please take care of Varerian...
[px]! Hahahaha!

Ah, [px] was punched!
Are you all right!? [px]! [px]—!!

Phew... Please take care of Varerian, [px]!
Hahaha... Hahahaha!

[px]! Varerian!
Wake up! Wake up, you guys—!
